task.summary: Default task
Adding User registration capabaliites, starting with services module
Updated user controller RequestMapping and fill out the signup method.
Added Exception Handler for all exceptions
Updated user controller to set default user role as nonadmin
Updated business logic for handling user registration exceptions
Updated the status reply message to meet requirements
Added Code for sign in and sign out.
Added code for retrieving user profile
Delete user code updated, pending delete the records from all the tables related to that user
Added @OnDelete(action = OnDeleteAction.CASCADE) to remove Access Tokens when user is removed.
Exception handler updated to provide accurate HTTP response codes based on error.
Corrected admin controller path variable error
Added Auth Token UUID to fix save error for auth token
Fixed pathvariable name, and fixed the request header authorization variable based on the request produced by swagger UI and Test cases.
Renamed pvt functions to reflect their purpose
Removed schema name and updated with @OnDelete to cascade delete of access tokens.
Fixed authorization tokens to reflect the swagger ui and test cases request format.
Removed table schema name
Test cases successfully completed.

MESSAGE.value: Adding User registration capabaliites, starting with services module
Updated user controller RequestMapping and fill out the signup method.
Added Exception Handler for all exceptions
